title: Singular Limits and String Solutions
abstract: It is shown that new leading ($\al'$) as well as all-order solutions of String theory can be obtained by taking appropriate singular limits of the known solutions. We give several leading order solutions for the bosonic as well as the heterotic string. We then present all-order forms of the previously known two dimensional cosmological solutions. An all-order form for the cosmological solution in three dimensions is also predicted. The physical implications of our results are discussed.
